forecast.name: Tonight

weather_report:
As the clock ushers in the late morning, Boston finds itself enveloped in a somber cloak of cloudiness, underscored by a whisper of chill. The streets sigh beneath a muted sky, the hues of the day leaning toward the cool side of the spectrum, reminiscent of fresh winter air. Though the temperature hovers near a biting thirty-four degrees, the gentle northeast wind adds a playful edge to the atmosphere, rustling the bare branches, as if inviting them to dance with the ever-elusive sun.

Tonight promises a similar yet softening embrace, with temperatures sliding down to around twenty-four degrees, as the clouds linger, allowing only a smattering of stars to peek through. It is a day meant for quiet contemplation or perhaps a brisk walk along the Charles, where the world feels a little more intimate against the backdrop of a cloudy sky. Ideal attire would include layers—a cozy sweater under a warm coat, perhaps accompanied by a lightweight scarf to fend off the chill. A leisurely coffee at a local café, the warmth seeping into your bones as you watch the world move at its own pace, might provide the perfect remedy for this dreary yet tranquil winter day.
